title: Little impact of new mutations on mammalian trait variation
content:
by Beth L. Dumont

New mutations provide the source of all genetic variation but their impact on trait variation remains poorly understood. A new study published in PLOS Biology addresses this question, finding that new mutations exert only weak effects on some traits in mice.
